answers.junior: Spring is a Java framework that makes it easier to build applications using dependency injection. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
answers.middle: Spring is a comprehensive framework providing IoC container, dependency injection, AOP, and integration with various technologies. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Core features include bean management and configuration.
answers.senior: Spring offers lightweight container with IoC/DI, declarative programming through AOP, comprehensive data access and transaction management. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Modular architecture enables selective feature adoption.
answers.tricky: Discuss Spring's evolution, comparison with Jakarta EE, Boot vs Framework, reactive programming support, and GraalVM native images. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
